SELECT mbr.*, mb.name as bankName FROM mem_bank_relation mbr Left join mem_bank mb on mbr.bank_id = mb.id where mbr.is_del = 0
and mbr.memId = #{req.memId}
and ( mbr.city like concat('%', #{req.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or mbr.account_opening_address like concat('%', #{req.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or mbr.phone like concat('%', #{req.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or mbr.email like concat('%', #{req.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
and mbr.create_time >= req.startTime
and mbr.create_time <= req.endTime
ORDER BY mbr.create_time desc
